verbs.description: [ARG0: runners] [V: break] [ARG1: records] and qualify for olympic trials at indianapolis monumental marathon more than 18 000 people participated in the indianapolis monumental marathon saturday morning the chilly weather made it perfect for many runners to get personal records some even qualified for the olympic trials with their half - marathon times olympic indianapolis founder des moines iowa indianapolis public schools indianapolis public school brogan austin indianapolis monumental marathon carlton ray des moines ind
